@ Ruby Version RTC routines
@ ------------------------------------------------

@ Routine 1
@ ------------------------------------------------
08009534  b5f0 push {r4-r7,lr}
08009536  1c05 add r5, r0, #0x0
08009538  1c0f add r7, r1, #0x0
0800953a  1c16 add r6, r2, #0x0
0800953c  f7ff bl $0800920c
08009540  1c04 add r4, r0, #0x0
08009542  0424 lsl r4, r4, #0x10
08009544  0c24 lsr r4, r4, #0x10
08009546  79a8 ldrb r0, [r5, #0x6]
08009548  f7ff bl $08009120
0800954c  7931 ldrb r1, [r6, #0x4]
0800954e  1a40 sub r0, r0, r1
08009550  7138 strb r0, [r7, #0x4]
08009552  7968 ldrb r0, [r5, #0x5]
08009554  f7ff bl $08009120
08009558  78f1 ldrb r1, [r6, #0x3]
0800955a  1a40 sub r0, r0, r1
0800955c  70f8 strb r0, [r7, #0x3]
0800955e  7928 ldrb r0, [r5, #0x4]
08009560  f7ff bl $08009120
08009564  78b1 ldrb r1, [r6, #0x2]
08009566  1a40 sub r0, r0, r1
08009568  70b8 strb r0, [r7, #0x2]

0800956e  803c strh r4, [r7, #0x0]
08009570  7939 ldrb r1, [r7, #0x4]

08009574  5638 ldrh r0, [r7, r0]

08009578  da05 bge $08009586
0800957a  1c08 add r0, r1, #0x0
0800957c  303c add r0, #0x3c
0800957e  7138 strb r0, [r7, #0x4]

@ Routine 2
@ ------------------------------------------------

080095bc  1c20 add r0, r4, #0x0
080095be  f7ff bl $080092b4
080095c2  4905 ldr r1, [$080095d8] (=$03004038)
080095c4  4a05 ldr r2, [$080095dc] (=$02024f3c)

080095c8  f7ff bl $08009534
080095cc  bc10 pop {r4}
080095ce  bc01 pop {r0}
080095d0  4700 bx r0

@ Routine 3 - cmd0x2D CheckDailyFlags
@ ------------------------------------------------
0806a360  b510 push {r4,lr}
0806a362  4809 ldr r0, [$0806a388] (=$00000835)
0806a364  f7fe bl $08069340 @ checkflag func
0806a368  0600 lsl r0, r0, #0x18
0806a36a  2800 cmp r0, #0x0
0806a36c  d008 beq $0806a380
0806a36e  f79f bl $080095b8
0806a372  4c06 ldr r4, [$0806a38c] (=$03004038)
0806a374  1c20 add r0, r4, #0x0
0806a376  f000 bl $0806a390
0806a37a  1c20 add r0, r4, #0x0
0806a37c  f000 bl $0806a3f4
0806a380  bc10 pop {r4}
0806a382  bc01 pop {r0}
0806a384  4700 bx r0
0806a386  0000 lsl r0, r0, #0x00

@ Routine 4
@ ------------------------------------------------
08054734  b500 push {lr}
08054736  f000 bl $080547a8
0805473a  f020 bl $08074d08
0805473e  f7ff bl $080542cc @ Day Night CheckTime routine
08054742  f7fe bl $0805338c
08054746  f7fe bl $08053198
0805474a  f00f bl $0806451c
0805474e  f015 bl $0806a360 @ Cmd0x2D checkdailyflags
08054752  f7fe bl $0805308c
08054756  f001 bl $08055fc0
0805475a  f7fe bl $08052c48
0805475a  f7fe bl $08052c48
0805475e  f010 bl $08065554
08054762  f010 bl $0806553c

0805476a  2801 cmp r0, #0x1
0805476c  d10c bne $08054788
0805476e  f7f3 bl $08047a04
08054772  f7ff bl $08053778
08054776  f7fe bl $08053440
0805477a  4802 ldr r0, [$08054784] (=$080544dd)
0805477c  f7ab bl $080003cc
08054780  e00a b $08054798
08054782  0000 lsl r0, r0, #0x00
08054784  44dd add sp, r11
08054786  0805 lsr r5, r0, #0x00

@ Routine 5
@ ------------------------------------------------

080003c0  bc10 pop {r4}

@ Routine 6
@ ------------------------------------------------
08000340  b510 push {r4,lr}
08000342  480c ldr r0, [$08000374] (=$03003040)
08000344  490c ldr r1, [$08000378] (=$03002f90)
08000346  4a0d ldr r2, [$0800037c] (=$03002a20)
08000348  f008 bl $08008848
0800034c  4c0c ldr r4, [$08000380] (=$03002a60)
0800034e  6020 str r0, [r4, #0x0]
08000350  480c ldr r0, [$08000384] (=$0300179c)
08000352  f007 bl $080075f0
08000356  6820 ldr r0, [r4, #0x0]
08000358  2180 mov r1, #0x80
0800035a  0049 lsl r1, r1, #0x01
0800035c  4008 and r0, r1
0800035e  2800 cmp r0, #0x0
08000360  d003 beq $0800036a
08000362  f055 bl $08055940
08000366  2801 cmp r0, #0x1
08000366  2801 cmp r0, #0x1
08000368  d001 beq $0800036e
0800036a  f000 bl $080003a8 @ calls Routine 5
0800036e  bc10 pop {r4}
08000370  bc01 pop {r0}
08000372  4700 bx r0

@ Routine 7 - Game Main()
@ ------------------------------------------------
0800024c  b5f0 push {r4-r7,lr}
0800024e  4647 mov r7, r8
08000250  b480 push {r7}
08000252  20fe mov r0, #0xfe
08000254  f1e0 bl $081e0804 @ REG_RAMReset
08000258  4922 ldr r1, [$080002e4] (=$04000204) @ REG_WAITCNT
0800025a  4a23 ldr r2, [$080002e8] (=$00004014)
0800025c  1c10 add r0, r2, #0x0
0800025e  8008 strh r0, [r1, #0x0] @ Set up REG_WAITCNT
08000260  f000 bl $08000400
08000264  f000 bl $080004c4
08000268  f1dd bl $081dde38
0800026c  f008 bl $08009248
08000270  f047 bl $080479cc
08000274  f000 bl $08000388
08000278  f074 bl $08074bac
0800027c  f000 bl $080003e4
08000280  481a ldr r0, [$080002ec] (=$03001bb4)
08000282  2400 mov r4, #0x0
08000284  7004 strb r4, [r0, #0x0]
08000286  481a ldr r0, [$080002f0] (=$03004820)
08000288  6800 ldr r0, [r0, #0x0]

0800028e  2000 mov r0, #0x0
08000290  f000 bl $080003cc
08000294  4817 ldr r0, [$080002f4] (=$03001764)
08000296  7004 strb r4, [r0, #0x0]

0800029a  4e18 ldr r6, [$080002fc] (=$030033a9)
0800029c  4818 ldr r0, [$08000300] (=$00000c84)
0800029e  1980 add r0, r0, r6

@ Routine 8 - Write RTC used by special 0x9A
@ ------------------------------------------------
080095e0  b500 push {lr}
080095e2  1c03 add r3, r0, #0x0
080095e4  1c0a add r2, r1, #0x0
080095e6  2000 mov r0, #0x0
080095e8  1c19 add r1, r3, #0x0
080095ea  2300 mov r3, #0x0
080095ec  f000 bl $080095f4
080095f0  bc01 pop {r0}
080095f2  4700 bx r0

080095f4  b530 push {r4,r5,lr}
080095f6  4c08 ldr r4, [$08009618] (=$03004038)
080095f8  8020 strh r0, [r4, #0x0]
080095fa  70a1 strb r1, [r4, #0x2]
080095fc  70e2 strb r2, [r4, #0x3]
080095fe  7123 strb r3, [r4, #0x4]
08009600  4d06 ldr r5, [$0800961c] (=$03000460)
08009602  1c28 add r0, r5, #0x0
08009604  f7ff bl $080092b4
08009608  4905 ldr r1, [$08009620] (=$02024f3c)
0800960a  1c28 add r0, r5, #0x0
0800960c  1c22 add r2, r4, #0x0
0800960e  f7ff bl $08009534
08009612  bc30 pop {r4,r5}
08009614  bc01 pop {r0}
08009616  4700 bx r0
